title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala Inspired Necklace with Carnelian Accents
materials: meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This captivating necklace blends traditional South Indian 'Kasu Mala' elements with a modern aesthetic. The design features a central floral motif with CZ stones around a natural pearl and further enhanced by a filigree heart pendant. Carnelian gemstones alternate with floral and heart shape embellishments along the chain, creating a rich contrast. The setting is expertly done to ensure the CZ stones sparkle brilliantly, and the goldwork has a flawless Hyderabadi polish.
colors: Warm Gold tones complemented by the vibrant reddish-orange hues of the carnelian and sparkling white of CZ stones.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance with a modern twist. Suitable for formal parties and cultural events as well.
description: This necklace offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The use of Carnelian gems brings a warm, auspicious color. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regal sophistication. The heart pendant adds a touch of romance, and the Kasu Mala elements connect you to rich cultural heritage.
